title: Consolidate Retirement Accounts (Rollover)
description: A new client wants to roll over an old 401(k) from a previous employer into a new IRA.

tasks.description: Open a new Rollover IRA account for the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new IRA account to receive the funds.

tasks.description: Assist the client in initiating a direct rollover from their old 401(k) provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the client with the necessary forms and account information to give to their old provider.

tasks.description: Once the funds are received, invest them according to the client's investment strategy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms receipt of the rollover check and invests the funds into the client's model portfolio.
